column2: In the Acllahuasi, this woman was instructed in the Inca ways of weaving. She has no great talent.
In the Acllahuasi, this woman was instructed in the Inca ways of weaving. She is a natural.
In the Acllahuasi, this woman was instructed in the Inca ways of weaving. She is a true prodigy - nobody can make textiles as well as she can.
In the Acllahuasi, this woman was taught the secret of making the Inca maize beer.
In the Acllahuasi, this woman learned how to make delicious maize bread, for religious or nutritious purposes.
In the Acllahuasi, this woman developed a most charming singing voice.
In the Acllahuasi, this woman was trained in Incan ritual and celebratory dances.
This woman is the highest possible class of Aclla. She is destined to be sacrificed to the gods.
This woman belongs to the second-highest class of Aclla, and she can only wed the Sapa Inca.
This woman is part of the third class of the Aclla, and has been offered as a wife to one of the Sapa Inca's vassals.
This woman turned out not to be a very impressive Aclla, and she has been made a servant to one of the Sapa Inca's vassals.
This young woman is being indoctrinated and sedated in preparation for her imminent sacrfice.
Only a fool would doubt [This.GetBestName]'s claim to possess the Mandate of Heaven.
Few would doubt [This.GetBestName]'s claim to possess the Mandate of Heaven.
[This.GetBestName] claims to possess the Mandate of Heaven. The truth of this claim is unverified.
Few would believe [This.GetBestName]'s claim to possess the Mandate of Heaven.
Only a fool would believe [This.GetBestName]'s claim to possess the Mandate of Heaven. May [This.GetSheHe] live in interesting times.
Of late, people have become more concerned that [This.GetBestName] might not possess the Mandate of Heaven.
OF late, people have become more convinced that [This.GetBestName] might possess the Mandate of Heaven.
A dragon has made its lair in this province
This province was recently set ablaze. Nothing but ashes remain.
Various Hwarang-led patrols are present here, deterring bandits, rebellious peasants, and the like.
This character is not currently interested in joining the Hwarang
This character has used their standing within the Hwarang to discourage their vassals from joining any factions
This character is currently trying to become a better member of the Hwarang
This character recently reflected on their traits
Due to a failed attempt to end the Permanent Regency this ruler is unable to govern at present.
This ruler's Permanent Regent has recently gained or lost power.
This ruler's Permanent Regent has forced them into secluded meditation for the time being, completely preventing any interference in government affairs.
This character was recently forced off their liege's council
